summary.span: 为文本行提供一个支持格式设置服务的抽象类。

span.span: Provides an abstract class for supporting formatting services to a line of text.

related.span: 高级文本格式设置示例

span.span: Advanced Text Formatting Sample

remarks.format: ## Remarks `null`当行结束于段落末尾时，返回值为。The return value is `null` when the line ends at the end of the paragraph. 文本格式化程序客户端可以将返回值作为参数传递给 方法，这允许在对同一段落中的下一行进行格式设置时使用该值。The text formatter client may pass the return value back as a parameter to the method, which allows the value to be used when formatting the next line within the same paragraph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当的属性设置为时，才设置属性值 ，并且一个字宽于格式设置段落宽度。The property value is set only when the property of is set to , and a single word is wider than the formatting paragraph width. 在这种情况下， 截断单词中间的行，以遵循通过设置指定的所需行为 。In such situation, truncates the line in the middle of the word to honor the desired behavior specified by setting.
